name: CONFLUENCE__GET_SPACES
description: Get all Confluence spaces accessible to the authenticated user. This returns a list of spaces that contain pages and content.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of spaces to return (default 25, max 250)

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of results

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_SPACE
description: Get detailed information about a specific Confluence space including description, permissions, and metadata.

id.description: The ID or key of the space

name: CONFLUENCE__CREATE_SPACE
description: Create a new Confluence space for organizing content. This allows creating personal or team spaces for documentation and collaboration.

key.description: A unique identifier for the space (3-255 chars, alphanumeric)

name.description: The display name of the space

type.description: The type of space to create

name: CONFLUENCE__UPDATE_SPACE
description: Update properties of a Confluence space such as name and description. This allows modifying space metadata.

id.description: The ID or key of the space to update

name.description: The updated display name of the space

description.description: The updated description of the space

name: CONFLUENCE__DELETE_SPACE
description: Delete a Confluence space. This permanently removes the space and all its content including pages and attachments.

id.description: The ID or key of the space to delete

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGES
description: Get pages from Confluence with advanced filtering options. This allows finding content across spaces and by various criteria.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and customization

id.description: Filter pages by specific IDs

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to return (default 25, max 250)

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of results

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGE
description: Get detailed information about a specific Confluence page including content, metadata, and version information.

id.description: The ID of the page

include-operations.description: Include available operations for the page

version.description: Get a specific version of the page

name: CONFLUENCE__CREATE_PAGE
description: Create a new page in a Confluence space. This allows adding new documentation, articles, or content to organize team knowledge.

spaceId.description: The ID of the space where the page will be created

parentId.description: The ID of the parent page (optional, creates top-level page if omitted)

representation.description: The format of the page body

name: CONFLUENCE__UPDATE_PAGE
description: Update an existing Confluence page with new content or metadata. This allows editing pages, updating documentation, and revising content.

id.description: The ID of the page to update
The ID of the page (must match path parameter)

title.description: The updated title of the page

representation.description: The format of the page body

number.description: The current version number of the page

name: CONFLUENCE__DELETE_PAGE
description: Delete a Confluence page. This moves the page to trash where it can be recovered by space administrators.

id.description: The ID of the page to delete

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGE_CHILDREN
description: Get child pages of a specific Confluence page. This allows exploring the page hierarchy and finding related content.

id.description: The ID of the parent page

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and customization

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of results

limit.description: Maximum number of child pages to return (default 25, max 250)

sort.description: Sort child pages by specified field

name: CONFLUENCE__SEARCH_CONTENT
description: Search for content across Confluence using full-text search. This allows finding pages, blog posts, and other content by keywords, titles, or authors.

cql.description: Confluence Query Language (CQL) search expression (e.g., 'type=page AND space=DEV')

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of results

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 25, max 250)

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_LABELS
description: Get all labels used across Confluence content. This helps discover available labels for organizing and categorizing content.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and pagination

sort.description: Sort labels by name or ID (ascending or descending)

limit.description: Maximum number of labels to return (default 25, max 250)

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of results

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGE_LABELS
description: Get all labels assigned to a specific Confluence page. This shows how the page is categorized and organized.

id.description: The ID of the page

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and pagination

sort.description: Sort labels by name or ID

limit.description: Maximum number of labels to return

name: CONFLUENCE__ADD_PAGE_LABELS
description: Add labels to a Confluence page for categorization and organization. This helps with content discovery and organization.

id.description: The ID of the page

body.description: Array of labels to add to the page

name: CONFLUENCE__REMOVE_PAGE_LABEL
description: Remove a specific label from a Confluence page. This allows managing page categorization and organization.

id.description: The ID of the page

label_id.description: The ID of the label to remove

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGE_COMMENTS
description: Get comments on a Confluence page. This allows viewing discussions and feedback on page content.

id.description: The ID of the page

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and customization

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to return

name: CONFLUENCE__CREATE_PAGE_COMMENT
description: Add a comment to a Confluence page. This allows providing feedback, asking questions, or starting discussions about page content.

id.description: The ID of the page to comment on

representation.description: The format of the comment body

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_COMMENT
description: Get detailed information about a specific comment including content and metadata.

id.description: The ID of the comment

include-operations.description: Include available operations for the comment

name: CONFLUENCE__UPDATE_COMMENT
description: Update an existing comment on a Confluence page. This allows editing comment content and metadata.

id.description: The ID of the comment to update
The ID of the comment (must match path parameter)

representation.description: The format of the comment body

number.description: The current version number of the comment

name: CONFLUENCE__DELETE_COMMENT
description: Delete a comment from a Confluence page. This permanently removes the comment from the page discussion.

id.description: The ID of the comment to delete

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_ATTACHMENTS
description: Get attachments from Confluence pages or across the entire instance. This allows finding and managing files, images, and documents.

id.description: Filter attachments by specific IDs

entity-id.description: Filter attachments by parent entity ID (page ID)

limit.description: Maximum number of attachments to return

name: CONFLUENCE__CREATE_ATTACHMENT
description: Upload an attachment to a Confluence page. This allows adding files, images, and documents to pages for reference and sharing.

contentType.description: The MIME type of the file

pageId.description: The ID of the page to attach files to

name: CONFLUENCE__DELETE_ATTACHMENT
description: Delete an attachment from a Confluence page. This permanently removes the file from the page.

id.description: The ID of the attachment to delete

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_SPACE_PAGES
description: Get all pages within a specific Confluence space. This allows exploring all content within a space for documentation management.

id.description: The ID or key of the space

query.description: Query parameters for filtering and customization

depth.description: Include all pages or only root-level pages

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to return

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_SPACE_PERMISSIONS
description: Get permissions for a Confluence space. This shows who has access to the space and what they can do.

id.description: The ID or key of the space

limit.description: Maximum number of permissions to return

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_BLOG_POSTS
description: Get blog posts from Confluence spaces. This allows finding and managing blog content for announcements and updates.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering blog posts

id.description: Filter blog posts by specific IDs

space-id.description: Filter blog posts by space IDs

title.description: Filter blog posts by title (exact match)

body-format.description: Format for blog post body content

include-labels.description: Include blog post labels in response

sort.description: Sort blog posts by specified field

limit.description: Maximum number of blog posts to return

name: CONFLUENCE__CREATE_BLOG_POST
description: Create a new blog post in a Confluence space. This allows publishing announcements, updates, and news to the team.

body.description: The blog post content and metadata

spaceId.description: The ID of the space where the blog post will be created

status.description: The status of the blog post

title.description: The title of the blog post

representation.description: The format of the blog post body

name: CONFLUENCE__UPDATE_BLOG_POST
description: Update an existing Confluence blog post with new content or metadata. This allows editing published announcements and updates.

id.description: The ID of the blog post to update
The ID of the blog post (must match path parameter)

status.description: The status of the blog post

title.description: The updated title of the blog post

representation.description: The format of the blog post body

number.description: The current version number of the blog post

name: CONFLUENCE__DELETE_BLOG_POST
description: Delete a Confluence blog post. This moves the blog post to trash where it can be recovered by space administrators.

id.description: The ID of the blog post to delete

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_USER_DETAILS
description: Get information about a Confluence user including profile data and account details.

account_id.description: The account ID of the user

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_CURRENT_USER
description: Get information about the currently authenticated user including profile and permissions.

name: CONFLUENCE__GET_PAGE_VERSIONS
description: Get version history for a Confluence page. This allows tracking changes and accessing previous versions of page content.

id.description: The ID of the page

limit.description: Maximum number of versions to return
